title: Today’s hot #TEMS topics: Impeachment rolls, North Korea goals, Guyger jury doles, FBI Lovebirds roles, and more!
text:
Today on The Ed Morrissey Show (4 pm ET), we have another great lineup for the news of the day! The show will be streamed on Hot Air’s Facebook page and embedded here and on the show page for those who are not on Facebook.

Join us as we welcome:

Andrew Malcolm joins us for Tuesdays with Andrew! The Prince of Twitter and I will discuss all of the hot political stories of the day. We’ll talk about the latest in impeachment news as Democrats switch from Russia to Ukraine, plus take a close look at how all of these stories are being reported. How far can you stretch an ellipsis, anyway?

Taylor Millard joins us to bring us up to speed on Amber Guyger’s conviction for murder in Texas earlier today. We will also discuss his conversation with Stephen Moore and the problem with drug price controls, a very hot topic in Washington at the moment.

Our friends Phelim McAleer and Ann McIlhenny have a new project launching next week! FBI Lovebirds: Undercovers will premiere on YouTube on October 7th, but you can watch this preview here as Phelim joins us to explain his “Hamilton for the MAGA crowd.” It stars Dean Cain (Superman, Gosnell) and Kristy Swanson (Buffy the Vampire Slayer) and it looks hilarious!

The Ed Morrissey Show and its dynamic chatroom can be seen on the permanent TEMS page. Be sure to join us, and don’t forget to keep up with the debate on my Facebook page, too!

How can Republicans and conservatives keep the momentum going? Find out in GOING RED, published in April from Crown Forum!
description: 4 pm ET with Andrew Malcolm, Taylor Millard, and Phelim McAleer!
